summary: Walmart, founded in 1962 by Sam and James Walton, is a huge American retail company. It runs thousands of stores worldwide, including hypermarkets, discount stores, and grocery shops. The company started in Arkansas and has grown to become the world's largest by revenue. Walmart operates in many countries, but some international ventures haven't been successful. It's a family-owned business, with the Walton family in control, and it employs millions of people. Walmart also owns Sam's Club and has expanded across the U.S. and into new markets over the years.
title: Walmart
